alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 4:35PM MST until February 26 at 11:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 4000 feet returns Saturday night into Sunday morning. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau and Northwest Deserts. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Watch for downed trees and powerlines as well.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
